locations.name: Dorm - Chestnut Residence
locations.brief_description: Your dorm that your share with your roommate.
locations.long_description: Your dorm at Chestnut Residence. It's a bit far from campus, but at least you have your own bathroom.

locations.name: Dining Commons - Chestnut Residence
locations.brief_description: You can eat some food here.
locations.long_description: Your residence dining hall. The food is kinda bad, but at least it's mandatory. You were here pretty late last night, but you don't seem to recall much...

locations.name: King's College Circle
locations.brief_description: Front campus. From here, you can access Hart House at the north, the Gerstein Science Information Centre to your east, the Bahen Centre for Information Technology to your west, and Chestnut to your south.
locations.long_description: The heart of UofT, where you can see the iconic view of University College. It's quite cold, so there aren't many students around. From here, you can access Hart House at the north, the Gerstein Science Information Centre to your east, the Bahen Centre for Information Technology to your west, and Chestnut to your south.

locations.name: Hart House - Main
locations.brief_description: You can access the Hart House Gym (and your locker) to the east, King's College Circle to your south, and Robarts to your west.
locations.long_description: A beautifully gothic student hub. You can access the Hart House Gym (and your locker) to the east, King's College Circle to your south, and Robarts to your west.

locations.name: Hart House - Gym
locations.brief_description: To your west is the main entrance of Hart House, and to your east is the Arbor Room.
locations.long_description: You need your TCard to access your locker... Maybe go look for it (or a friend who might have it)... To your west, you have the exit to the main floor of Hart House, and to your east you have the Arbor Room.

locations.name: Hart House - Arbor Room
locations.brief_description: You can go west to go back to the Hart House Gym.
locations.long_description: A cute little cafe tucked inside Hart House. You can go west to go back to the Hart House Gym.

locations.name: Bahen Centre for Information Technology
locations.brief_description: To your north is Robarts, to your east is King's College Circle, and to your south is your dorm.
locations.long_description: The Bahen (pronounced BAY-hen) Centre is the hub for CS and EngSci students alike. To your north is Robarts, to your east is King's College Circle, and to your south is your dorm.
